sentences.en: A home does not consist in the quality of its architecture and decoration.
sentences.cn: 家之所以为家并不在于住所的设计与修饰.

sentences.en: Each period had its own particular style of architectural decoration.
sentences.cn: 每个时期都有其建筑装饰上的风格.

sentences.en: He gave Stephanie a free hand in the decoration.
sentences.cn: 他放手让斯蒂芬妮全权负责装修一事。

sentences.en: His genius was not confined to the decoration of buildings.
sentences.cn: 他的天赋不单体现在建筑物的装饰上。

sentences.en: Interior decoration by careful coordination seems to have had its day.
sentences.cn: 精心搭配的室内装饰似乎已不再受欢迎了。

sentences.en: She picked a large bunch of flowers for table decoration.
sentences.cn: 她采了一大捧花来装饰桌子.

sentences.en: The curtains do not match with the decoration.
sentences.cn: 窗帘与室内装璜不相配.

sentences.en: The decoration and furnishings had to be practical enough for a family home.
sentences.cn: 房子的装潢和家具都必须很实用，适合家居生活。

sentences.en: the elaborate decoration on the carved wooden door
sentences.cn: 木雕门上精美的装饰图案

sentences.en: The general wore a decoration on his left breast.
sentences.cn: 那位将军在左胸前佩戴了一枚勋章.

sentences.en: The most arresting feature is the painted wall decoration.
sentences.cn: 最醒目的特点是绘有图画的墙面装饰。

sentences.en: The planting of winter and spring-flowering bulbs will supply colourful decoration at a time when most gardens are looking fairly desolate.
sentences.cn: 栽种冬春季节开花的鳞茎植物可以在大多数花园看上去还比较萧索的时候提供多彩的装点。

sentences.en: The renovation process and decoration took four months.
sentences.cn: 翻新和粉刷总共耗时4个月。

sentences.en: You can use embroidery stitches for further decoration.
sentences.cn: 你可以用刺绣来作进一步的装饰。

sentences.en: You may not care for this kind of decoration at first, but as you get used to it , you will find it grows on you.
sentences.cn: 开始,你也许不喜欢这种服饰, 可是当你见惯了就会觉得越来越喜欢它了.

words.tran_cn: 装饰，修饰（decorate的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 装饰，装饰风格，装饰品，勋章
trans.tran_en: something pretty that you put in a place or on top of something to make it look attractive
